external_references.description: Symantec Threat Hunter Team. (2021, January 18). Raindrop: New Malware Discovered in SolarWinds Investigation. Retrieved January 19, 2021.

description: During the [SolarWinds Compromise](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0024), [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) used 7-Zip to decode their [Raindrop](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0565) malware.(Citation: Symantec RAINDROP January 2021)
